title: All as TriG
desc: This convenience file separates the constituent ontologies into graphs.

desc: This convenience file in JSON-LD concatenates the constituent ontologies into a single file.

title: All as Turtle
desc: This convenience file combines the constituent ontologies into a single graph.

title: All as RDF/XML
desc: This convenience file in RDF/XML concatenates the constituent ontologies into a single file.
